rows.label: tlk45320351_03_msg0001
rows.name:
No matter what may become of
Alst, it is our sworn duty to
ensure the safety of the Emperor.

rows.label: tlk45320351_03_msg0002
rows.name:
But only you can combat the
crisis that threatens us all.

rows.label: tlk45320351_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Please, do what you can.
You are our only hope.

rows.label: tlk45320351_03_msg0102
rows.name:
The Carraig Imperial Guard will
defend His Majesty with our lives.

rows.label: tlk45320351_03_msg0103
rows.name:
You can count on us to protect him,
so I beg of you...protect Alst.
